---
name: Use a doc template
about: Get help or share output from a workflow template (GTM, dissection, authenticity, etc.)
title: "[Template] "
labels: template, triage
assignees: ''
---

## Which template?

Pick the template you're using or need help with. Links point to the full template in the repo.

- [ ] [Idea dissection](https://github.com/ummahbuild/ideas/blob/main/docs/templates/idea-dissection.md) – problem, solution, users, scope
- [ ] [Islamic authenticity](https://github.com/ummahbuild/ideas/blob/main/docs/templates/islamic-authenticity.md) – Sharia alignment, scholarly input
- [ ] [Go to market](https://github.com/ummahbuild/ideas/blob/main/docs/templates/go-to-market.md) – launch strategy, channels, first 90 days
- [ ] [Competitive analysis](https://github.com/ummahbuild/ideas/blob/main/docs/templates/competitive-analysis.md) – competitors, differentiation
- [ ] [Market opportunity & research](https://github.com/ummahbuild/ideas/blob/main/docs/templates/market-opportunity-research.md) – TAM/SAM/SOM, validation
- [ ] [Brand / name generation](https://github.com/ummahbuild/ideas/blob/main/docs/templates/brand-generation.md) – name, voice, identity
- [ ] [Target personas](https://github.com/ummahbuild/ideas/blob/main/docs/templates/target-personas.md) – who you're building for
- [ ] [Messaging for personas](https://github.com/ummahbuild/ideas/blob/main/docs/templates/messaging-for-personas.md) – copy and value props
- [ ] [Social media marketing](https://github.com/ummahbuild/ideas/blob/main/docs/templates/social-media-marketing.md) – social and content plan
- [ ] [Launch checklist](https://github.com/ummahbuild/ideas/blob/main/docs/templates/launch-checklist.md) – pre-launch checklist

### What do you need?

- **Using a template:** Paste or link your filled template (e.g. in a gist or comment) and ask for feedback.
- **Requesting a new template:** Describe the kind of doc you need (e.g. "PRD for Islamic fintech") and how it would fit the [workflows](https://github.com/ummahbuild/ideas/tree/main/docs/workflows).
- **Other:** Describe your question or suggestion.

### Your message

(Describe what you're working on and what you need.)
